forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear. Low around 46, with temperatures rising to around 48 overnight. North northeast wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. North northeast wind around 7 mph.

weather_report:
As the tranquility of the night settles over Downtown San Francisco, one can sense a crisp clarity in the cool air. The temperature lingers in the low forties, gradually nudging upwards as the night deepens. With a gentle north-northeast breeze whispering through the streets, the absence of fog paints a clear canvas, offering unobstructed views of the iconic skyline and the Golden Gate Bridge glimmering in the distance. The calm serenity invites a peaceful stroll, where one can embrace the stillness before dawn conjures a new day.

As the sun rises, the promise of a beautiful Thursday unfolds. Radiant sunshine will grace the city with warmth, peaking near sixty-three before the afternoon gently ushers in a drop in temperature. Layers will be your best friend—consider a light sweater or jacket for the morning chill, transitioning to something more comfortable as the day matures. The pleasant weather beckons for a leisurely walk along the waterfront, perhaps a visit to one of the vibrant local cafés, where one can savor a warm beverage while soaking in the sun’s embrace. Today is not just another day; it invites you to pause and relish in the beauty of the city, one tranquil moment at a time.
